title: Caramel millionaire's shortbread
ingredients: ['For the base', '225g plain flour', '100g semolina', '100g caster sugar', '225g salted butter', 'For the caramel topping', '175g butter', '1 can (397g) condensed milk', '4 tablespoons golden syrup', '175g caster sugar', '100g dark chocolate', '200g milk chocolate']
